tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Dental Crowns,RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Dental Implant Fixing,
review:
I have visited Goel Dental in past also and every time, I get wonderful response both at reception as well as from Dr. Shikha,who patiently hears my problem and identifies the root cause of the Problem. Instead of suggesting short cut, She always suggests the permanent solution. She is quite experienced and has very good hand for all kinds of Dental surgery. She is very humble and soft spoken and makes one fully at ease.
She has all latest machines available in the clinic. Like for making a crown ,precise measurement and design is made and within an hour or two crown is ready. This avoids frequent visits
   Clinic is very hygienic and ambience very soothing. Staff is very polite and helpful
I admire Dr. Shikha for being so proficient *** ************* **  *** ***** ** *************** I wish her all the best in her future career.
R.K.Agarwal
  Retired Director BSNL

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I must say I made a right choice by visiting Goel Dental. Team Goel Dental is deeply committed to excellence and treatment provided is world class. I went to them for a troubling painful tooth, I was advised a repeat root canal after checkup and xray. I felt the time spent by Dr Shikha on listening to my concerns is not what I expected from a busy doctor. My tooth was subjected to a digital xray and when my xray was explained to me I could easily appreciate the problem in my tooth.  The entire procedure was painless, neat and every team member was careful regarding cleanliness and hygiene during the entire procedure. After completion of root treatment in 2 visits, I received crown on this, as well got my 2 other old crowns replaced by Dr Shikha. Getting crowns was a breeze and an experience that has made Goel Dental my preferred place for any future dental work.  My crowns were delivered in 2 hours starting from impression (digital), manufacturing and fixing.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Visit to Goel Dental was an unplanned visit. I just visited clinic for price enquiry and after one hour I was walking out with two dental implants in my mouth. Goel Dental is very equipped, modern and laced with capacities to execute dental treatment of complex nature.  And for sure I saved a lot by getting treatment from Goel Dental.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,
review: It is not easy for a 68 year old to trust a new dentist specially when treatment required is complex. After t/t i can say i made right selection of clinic and dentist . I reside in Ashok vihar but for sure distance is not important when dentist and treatment is trust worthy and at a  mark above the rest.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Painless Single visit root canal treatment,Zirconia Crowns,
review: Got my dental treatment completed without pain and without any hassle. Everything proceeded as planned in initial appointment and final cost was also within the estimate given in first appointment. Magnitude of treatment required in my mouth was very big but with skill set and equipment possessed by Dr Shikha my treatment was completed in hardly 4-5 visits of which only one visit was taken by Dr Shikha and Dr Akansha to manufacture and fit four zirconia crowns as the last part of my treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Satisfied with treatment provided by Dr Shikha and team. She very well takes care of patient. I am diabetic and she exercised all her patience with me by going slow with my treatment and waiting every time for complete recovery before proceeding further.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
context: Tooth Coloured Fillings,Bleeding Gums Treatment,Tooth Extraction,
review: I got few fillings done at Goel dental from Dr Sikha. Her clinic is very clean and well maintained and always looks new. i had no pain during the fillings. she has become my family dentist now and my younger brother and parents also visit her for their dental problems.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I was having crooked teeth and was always embarrassed to smile. I visited Dr. Shikha Goel for treatment. She assisted me very nicely and I got 8 crowns and 3 RCT done from her. She was very polite through the whole process. Although my case took little long. But it is all worth. Thanks Dr. Shikha Goel.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I'm more than happy to recommend Dr. Goel. one of my teeth broke and was causing pain. Her clinic was open even on Sunday.  She took care of the problem and was extremely thorough in explaining  the procedure, time frame and estimated budget for implants which I need.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I visited Dr Shikha Goel at Malviya Nagar clinic with severe tooth pain. Dr was very friendly and polite. She attended me in no time and explained me about the treatment. I underwent RCT, wisdom tooth extraction, and few fillings which was done painlessly by her. Since i told her i stay in Vaishali she did my root canal sittings at her Kaushambi clinic too which was very convenient for me. Both her clinics were well equipped and clean with necessary facilities. I am glad I chose Dr Shikha to treat me based on her reviews and she lived up to my. expectations!

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Painless Single visit root canal treatment,
review: My experience at Goel Dental was a very smooth one. I fell down and broke my front tooth just before my friend's wedding. The root canal was completed by Dr Shikha on the same day and i got a ceramic crown in 1 hour. the crown is very natural looking. The best part was that the follow up was done at their Kalkaji centre which is closer to my office so I saved a lot of time in travelling to Malviya Nagar and also my leave. The team at both Kalklaji and Malviya Nagar is very knowledgable.  The Malviya Nagar centre is very well equipped.  This was my first ever dental experience and I feel very confident. Highly recommended.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: My wisdom teeth surgery went without any pain. I was very scared before surgery as I thought it would be a very stressful and a painful procedure, but repetitive pain and infection in my wisdom teeth forced me to undergo dental treatment that i kept postponing due to fear of surgery.  The entire procedure was completed in same visit as the clinic is equipped with facilities to undertake such surgery.  The hygiene in the clinic appeared to be A-one and the instruments used during the operation were being removed from pouches. The next visit was only for removal of stitch.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: I went for front teeth gap and staining of front tooth. I was very skeptical about the results. Dr Shikha comprehended my dilemma very well and cleared  my all apprehensions. I was astonished when she superimposed treatment plan on my photo and designed my veneers on a  computer screen. While doing so she was electronically recording shade of my natural teeth,  i could also see how the shape of my other teeth was used to mimic the veneer design. What came out was nothing short of a wonder and realization of a dream coming true.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: She has good experience and took care of minimal issues as well. The would recommend her to my close friends and family

Thanks . The doctor is helpful, gentle and genuine. Doctor doesn't try to offer their dental treatments unnecessarily.

I would definitely recommend

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: A clean dental clinic for dental treatment, no fear of dirty equipment or anything unclean beind used in mouth. A gentle treatment in the form of teeth cleaning and filling was received.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Very happy with the treatment received. Dr Shikha has a well maintained clinic at her residence and the treament is painless. My kids were also happy after the procedure , none compained of pain.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Finally had my implant treatment completed by Dr Shikha at Goel Dental. Entire treatment went as per plan. No pain or discomfort during the process. Finally got a confident smile.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: General  Dentistry,RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Microscope Assisted Root Canal Treatment,Zirconia Crowns,
review: Pain free dental treatment and satisfactory end result. Every visit was on time no bothersome waiting, clean environment and experienced hands of dentist. Definitely an excellent place for dental work.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: It was an overall worth recommending experience. Treatment was not only good but fast and very pleasing.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review: Well kept facility. Doctor was through and gave full information and correct advice. Suggested the best options and let me decide without pressure.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Amazing doctor so much of patience she has as my 6 year old is not cooperative but still she make sure she gives the best treatment to her. Awsome
reply_text:

My pleasure!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
review: It was good. Doctor explained me the issue and suggested me the best treatment. I have teeth which are dislocated l. So doctor suggested me to get one extracted and then get the braces so that my teeth could be aligned. Also, I might require some rct treatment after extraction in nearby teeths

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
context: Dental Crowns,Surgical Tooth Extraction,Acrylic Partial Denture,
review: Blessings to Dr Shikha for being so empathetic towards her patients. I am an 83 old patient that required so much of dental work before flying to Australia. Dr Shikha made sure that all my work is completed within stipulated time. No discomfort was felt during or after treatment. She is precise and thorough in her field.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I visited Goel Dental Malviya Nagar for sensitivity and hole in my molar tooth. She tooth an x ray and told me about a cavity in that tooth and said that i need a filling. i also got cleaning done . It was a neat and clean clinic and doctor Shikha was very nice in behaviour. she has told me to visit once every six months for check up. i will always go to her for my dental problems. Thank you very much Dr Shikha

tags: Value for money,
review:
Experience is bed as when I reached there,they have informed me they require rtpcr report which should be not more than 2 days old however which was not mentioned earlier and just for visit charges she has charged consultant fees(Rs.500)..

Think as per patient point of view in such a scenario where we are not going out due to panadamic..due to unbearable pain I have to visit doctor place and took a risk of my as well as my family life still find no solution...
reply_text: Dear patient, we do not recommend RT PCR for all patients so it is not mentioned on website. We examine patient and based on what kind of treatment is required we recommend RT PCR, so again test is not required for all patients. You were examined and based on that a treatment suggestion was given and based on treatment suggestion you were required to undergo a RT PCR test. You seem to be disregardful for the safety of health care establishment and its staff and is only concerned about yourself atleast other patients reading this review will come to know about safety procedures and protocol we follow.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: ProffesionalPoliteProwessValuehygienestate of art facilities and equipmentskeeping it sort and simple this is how i can share my experience....a big thumbs up and no thought recommendations....üëçüëç
The xray area is very small, one has to move in like a kid to et there. Main doctor left after we reached. Overall not recommended
reply_text: The Xray area you mentioned is a specially designed room and cannot be compared to your drawing or bedroom. Xray room is kept to minimum possible size to prevent unnecessary radiation hazard and all its walls are lead lined to prevent Xray leakage directly or through rebound. You should be thankful that we have Xray facility in our clinic itself and you don't have to waste your time in getting it done from somewhere else. Getting treatment done or not from our clinic is your own personal decision but being an uninformed person you do not have authority to recommend us or not to others

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: Dr Shika is amazing! She gives great advice and is super fast in providing treatment. If you need a dentist in Delhi, please just go to her! I feel like I have new teeth :D
